subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Omari Lawrence, a 6-foot-4 shooting guard rated as one of the top 100 players in the high school class of 2009, signed his letter of intent to St. John’s on Thursday.
snippet: Omari Lawrence, a 6-foot-4 shooting guard rated as one of the top 100 players in the high school class of 2009, signed his letter of intent to St. John’s on Thursday.
